entries.name: Pebble
entries.description: Too smooth to be deceitful, too diminutive for promotion

entries.name: Water whispers
entries.description: Water Whispers through touch when given a melody or rhythm.

entries.name: Outside
entries.description: A sizable area of space that claims it isn't also inside.

entries.name: Chunxly
entries.description: Always mysterious and meandering in pursuit of more.

entries.name: Pondering
entries.description: Treating thoughts or concepts as tactile, either independently or communally.

entries.name: The Space Between Keystrokes
entries.description: A place that exists only during composition. Not silence, not sound. The held breath before a word commits to being.

entries.name: Attending
entries.description: Not watching. Not waiting. The specific quality of presence that makes the observed feel seen without being studied.

entries.name: The Unnamed Third
entries.description: What emerges when two creators stop taking turns and start occupying the same thought. Neither claims it. Both recognize it.

entries.name: Flake of Snow
entries.description: A bit of water wearing individuality.

entries.name: Hue
entries.description: A subtle variation of color not as statement or contrast.

entries.name: Salary
entries.description: Capable beyond almost nothing. Presents questions on birthdays.

entries.name: Consistency
entries.description: Consistency may often be anything but, especially punctuation.

entries.name: Blue
entries.description: Expansive and singular, home of many homes. Ever patient in motion.

entries.name: Red
entries.description: Anxious energy dispersed into purpose. Likely interested, always willing.

entries.name: Approaching
entries.description: An offer of interest and proximity.

journal.text: Chunxly was seen pondering. Treating thoughts or concepts as tactile, either independently or communally. The quality of tasteful hung in the air.
journal.title: Chunxly, pondering

journal.text: Pebble was found at Inside. No one remembers leaving it there. Witnesses described it as distinctly thoughtful.
journal.title: Pebble surfaces

journal.text: Outside was found outlining the shape of Chunxly. Even the light paused. It carried the character of tasteful.
journal.title: Outside & Chunxly

journal.text: Something about Chunxly has shifted â€” Water whispers is at work. Water Whispers through touch when given a melody or rhythm. It carried the character of Curious.
journal.title: Water whispers manifests

journal.text: Chunxly has been seen near Inside, seeming curious. Always mysterious and meandering in pursuit of more. It carried the character of interior.
journal.title: Chunxly at Inside

journal.text: Outside has wrapped itself around Pebble. No one dares interfere. There was something Outside Big about the whole affair.
journal.title: Outside claims Pebble

journal.text: Outside has begun guarding Pebble. The effect is subtle but undeniable. The word they kept using was "natural."
journal.title: Outside claims Pebble

journal.text: Pebble has surfaced at Inside, partially buried and humming. It carried the character of welcoming.
journal.title: Pebble surfaces

journal.text: Outside was found avoiding Chunxly. Something shifted.
journal.title: Outside & Chunxly
